vague_description: Determining the optimal number of light and heavy sandwiches to produce within ingredient and time constraints.
detailed_description: A grilled cheese shop sells a light and heavy grilled cheese sandwich. A light grilled cheese sandwich requires \param{BreadPerLight} slices of bread and \param{CheesePerLight} slices of cheese. A heavy grilled cheese sandwich requires \param{BreadPerHeavy} slices of bread and \param{CheesePerHeavy} slices of cheese. Since most people who come to the store love grilled cheese, the store must make at least \param{HeavyToLightRatio} times as many heavy grilled cheese sandwiches as light grilled cheese sandwiches. The store has available \param{TotalBread} slices of bread and \param{TotalCheese} slices of cheese. If a light grilled cheese sandwich takes \param{TimeLight} minutes to make and a heavy grilled cheese sandwich takes \param{TimeHeavy} minutes to make, how many of each should they make to minimize the total production time?
target_objective: Minimize the total production time for both types of grilled cheese sandwiches
target_constraints: Number of light grilled cheese sandwiches is an integer
Number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches is an integer
Number of light grilled cheese sandwiches is non-negative
Number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches is non-negative
Heavy grilled cheese sandwiches must be at least HeavyToLightRatio times the number of light grilled cheese sandwiches
Total slices of bread used cannot exceed TotalBread
Total slices of cheese used cannot exceed TotalCheese
Bread used for light grilled cheese sandwiches is BreadPerLight times the number of light grilled cheese sandwiches
Cheese used for light grilled cheese sandwiches is CheesePerLight times the number of light grilled cheese sandwiches
Bread used for heavy grilled cheese sandwiches is BreadPerHeavy times the number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches
Cheese used for heavy grilled cheese sandwiches is CheesePerHeavy times the number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches
target_parameters: Number of bread slices required for a light grilled cheese sandwich
Number of cheese slices required for a light grilled cheese sandwich
Number of bread slices required for a heavy grilled cheese sandwich
Number of cheese slices required for a heavy grilled cheese sandwich
Ratio of heavy to light grilled cheese sandwiches required
Time to make a light grilled cheese sandwich
Time to make a heavy grilled cheese sandwich
